Nightlight:

Nightlight had landed a large time ago but she felt tired, Sh had 
wounds in her legs but she liked stay there to help her friends.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Much obliged Grounded."  He grimaced slightly and sprinted out 
of the 
> base.  At the door he concentrated and was on the verge of failure 
when he 
> spotted Deemos.  In a flash of fury he transformed and continued 
running 
> straight at Deemos.  "How dare you attack us again!"  He lashes out 
with his 
> energy-bladed staff.
